title: Apple iPhone 13 Pro Max
description:
iPhone 13 Pro Max. The biggest Pro camera system upgrade ever. Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion for a faster, more responsive feel. Lightning-fast A15 Bionic chip. Superfast 5G.¹ Durable design and the best battery life ever in an iPhone.² 
 Key feature bullets  
 •	6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion for a faster, more responsive feel³ 
 •	Cinematic mode adds shallow depth of field and shifts focus automatically in your videos 
 •	Pro camera system with new 12MP Telephoto, Wide, and Ultra Wide cameras; LiDAR Scanner; 6x optical zoom range; macro photography; Photographic Styles, ProRes video, Smart HDR 4, Night mode, Apple ProRAW, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording 
 •	12MP TrueDepth front camera with Night mode, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording 
 •	A15 Bionic chip for lightning-fast performance 
 •	Up to 28 hours of video playback, the best battery life ever in an iPhone² 
 •	Durable design with Ceramic Shield 
 •	Industry-leading IP68 water resistance⁴ 
 •	5G for superfast downloads and high-quality streaming¹ 
 •	iOS 15 packs new features to do more with iPhone than ever before⁵ 
 •	Supports MagSafe accessories for easy attach and faster wireless charging⁶ 
 Legal 
 ¹Data plan required. 5G is available in select markets and through select carriers. Speeds vary based on site conditions and carrier. For details on 5G support, contact your carrier and see apple.com/iphone/cellular. 
 ²Battery life varies by use and configuration. See apple.com/batteries for more information.  
 ³The display has rounded corners that follow a beautiful curved design, and these corners are within a standard rectangle. When measured as a standard rectangular shape, the screen is 6.68 inches diagonally. Actual viewable area is less.  
 ⁴iPhone 13 Pro Max is spill, splash, and dust resistant and was tested under controlled laboratory conditions with a rating of IP68 under IEC standard 60529. Spill, splash, and dust resistance are not permanent conditions. Resistance might decrease as a result of normal wear. Do not attempt to charge a wet iPhone; refer to the user guide for cleaning and drying instructions. Liquid damage not covered under warranty.  
 ⁵Some features may not be available for all countries or all areas.  
 ⁶Accessories are sold separately. 
 Technical specifications  
 Go to apple.com/iphone/compare for a complete set.

specifications.Camera Features: HDR Imaging, Slow Motion Recording, Front and Rear Facing Cameras, Ultra Wide Angle Lens, Motion Detection
specifications.Electronics Features: Haptic Feedback, Quick Charge, Super Retina XDR Display, Wireless Charging, Auto Focus, Picture-In-Picture, Dual SIM, Face Detection Technology
specifications.Warranty: 1 Year Limited Warranty. To obtain a copy of the manufacturer's or supplier's warranty for this item prior to purchasing the item, please call Target Guest Services at 1-800-591-3869
specifications.Contract Cell Phone Coverage Or Contract: All carrier/phone availability varies by location. Price requires New or eligible renewal 2-yr wireless voice agreement with qualifying data plan, credit approval and may require deposit. Subject to carrier agreement terms and conditions. Excludes taxes & surcharges. Subject to activation and early termination fees. Restrictions apply. Monthly access, data, overage, taxes and other charges apply. Price match not valid on mobile phones. REDcard™ 5% Rewards not eligible on Target.com purchases.

highlights:
6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion for a faster, more responsive feel³ 
 Cinematic mode adds shallow depth of field and shifts focus automatically in your videos 
 Pro camera system with new 12MP Telephoto, Wide, and Ultra Wide cameras; LiDAR Scanner; 6x optical zoom range; macro photography; Photographic Styles, ProRes video, Smart HDR 4, Night mode, Apple ProRAW, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording 
 12MP TrueDepth front camera with Night mode, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording 
 A15 Bionic chip for lightning-fast performance 
 Up to 28 hours of video playback, the best battery life ever in an iPhone² 
 Durable design with Ceramic Shield 
 Industry-leading IP68 water resistance⁴

questions.Q1:
it's locked by AT&T carrier ?

Thank you

answers.ANS0: Can a Verizon user get this phone? I don’t want to change carriers. Thanks.
answers.ANS1: Hi, NN! Regarding your question about the Apple iPhone 13 Pro Max: It works only through AT&T and can get activated to an existing line. If you have any additional questions, please do not hesitate to contact MyTGTtech at 877-698-4883 every day, between 7am-11pm CST.
answers.ANS2: Yes it helpful and I like to trade in my iPhone 11 for iPhone 13 pro max

questions.Q2: Is the charger included in the box? The description doesn’t say what is included.

answers.ANS0: Hi, BellasMom! Regarding your question about the Apple iPhone 13 Pro Max: As with all new iPhone 13 models this comes with a USB-C - Lightning charging cable, though it doesn't include a power adapter. If you have any additional questions, please do not hesitate to contact MyTGTtech at 877-698-4883 every day, between 7am-11pm CST.
answers.ANS1: Excellent tho at least charge faster
